resources:
Finance Privacy Policy Please, read the privacy policy carefully and click "Accept" to continue.


This page is used to inform visitors regarding my policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use my Service.


If you choose to use my Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that I collect is used for providing and improving the Service. I will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.


Information Collection and Use


For a better experience, while using our Service, I may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to Android advertising identifier. The information that I request will be retained on your device and is not collected by me in any way.


The app does use third party services that may collect information used to identify you.


Link to privacy policy of third party service providers used by the app



Google Play Services
AdMob
Firebase Analytics
Fabric
Crashlytics


Log Data


I want to inform you that whenever you use my Service, in a case of an error in the app I collect data and information (through third party products) on your phone called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (“IP”) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing my Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.


Cookies


Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are commonly used as anonymous unique identifiers. These are sent to your browser from the websites that you visit and are stored on your device's internal memory.


This Service does not use these "cookies" explicitly. However, the app may use third party code and libraries that use "cookies" to collect information and improve their services. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies and know when a cookie is being sent to your device. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of this Service.


Service Providers


I may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:



To facilitate our Service;
To provide the Service on our behalf;
To perform Service-related services;
To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.


I want to inform users of this Service that these third parties have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.


Security


I value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and I cannot guarantee its absolute security.


Links to Other Sites


This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by me. Therefore, I strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. I have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.


Changes to This Privacy Policy


I may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. I will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page.


Contact Us


If you have any questions or suggestions about my Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact me at raman.ortsiukh@gmail.com. Accept Decline Ads personalization Select the type of advertisement being viewed 

Personalized advertising allows advertisers to cover certain categories of users, depending on their interests and demographic affiliation, as well as data from other sources. Personalized advertising helps to more effectively use advertising resources. You can always opt out of it in your Google account settings. 

Non-personalized advertising is an advertisement whose content does not take into account the user's actions. Personalized Non-personalized
//main Welcome! With this program you can control your finances: record all income, expenses and debts.
Several settings will help you to choose the desired budget counting mode.
You can also view statistics for different periods of time and find out where the money goes.
Tips are displayed on each screen to familiarize yourself with the program.
Continue Balance at this moment card cash Add + More > Settings > Expenses this month Debts Total balance exceed the set value and may not be displayed correctly!
Please do not use such large numbers in your calculations.
Total expenses exceed the set value and may not be displayed correctly!
Please do not use such large numbers in your calculations.
Total debts exceed the set value and may not be displayed correctly!
Please do not use such large numbers in your calculations.
Warning: don't show warnings don't show hints Main screen On this screen you can see your current balance, the amount of expenses in this month, as well as the amount of debt for all time. 

To add a balance click "Add +"
in the Balance section. 

To view the balance at the beginning of the month, as well as select settings, click "Settings >" in the Balance section. 

To add an expense click
"Add +" in the Expenses section. 

To view all your income, expenses, complete statistics, as well as to change or delete an entry, click "More >"
in the Expenses section. 

To add a debt click "Add +" in the Debts section. 

To view all your debts or others, to change or delete a debt, click "More >" in the Debts section.
//balance_more at the beginning of the month < Back Delete all data All data is deleted from what day the month starts: 
(affects the calculation of the current month)
transfer of balance to the next month: 
(the current balance will take into account 
the balance of all previous months)
consider debts when calculating the budget: 
(the money received in debt will increase the 
balance, and the money given will decrease)
show hints show warnings Yes No OK Cancel Select / reset all Are you sure you want to delete all data? 
(this action is irreversible)
The number can be in the range 
from 1 to 31
Balance and settings On this screen you can see the current balance, the balance at the beginning of the month. Here you can also change the settings for calculating the balance, the settings for displaying hints and warnings, delete all saved data. 

To change the number from which the new month is counted, enter a number from 1 to 31, the program will remember it itself. 

To change any other setting, check or uncheck the desired setting, the program will remember your choice.
//balance_new Enter the amount: Date
Add > Transfer > add to card add to cash transfer from card to cash transfer from cash to card comment Balance added Balance updated Balance removed Balance transferred Enter the amount! Are you sure you want to delete this income? 
(this action is irreversible)
The input amount can contain: 

- up to 7 digits for dollars 
- up to 2 digits for cents
There is not enough money on the card to transfer to cash. 
Continue anyway?
Cash is not enough to transfer to the card. 
Continue anyway?
Income operations On this screen you can add a new income, change or delete an existing one. You can also transfer part of the money from the card to cash and vice versa. 

To add income, enter the amount, select a date if necessary, select how income came: on a card or in cash, add a comment if necessary. 

To change the income you need to do the same operations, only with existing income.
//expenses_new Expense Change > Delete > Food Transport, auto Internet, telecom Clothes, shoes House Household chemicals Health Appliances Entertainment Gifts Pets Credits Education Other Income
Change the name of the selected category
Enter a new category name: Enter a category name! Change category name? 
(the name will change for all the records for the previous period)
Default Category name successfully updated! Are you sure you want to remove this expense? 
(this action is irreversible)
Expense added Expense updated Expense removed Not enough balance for this operation. 
Continue anyway?
Expense operations On this screen you can add a new expense, change or delete an existing one. You can also change the name of the selected category to any other. 

To add an expense, enter the amount, select a date as needed, select a purchase category, choose where the money is spent from: a card or cash, add a comment if necessary. 

To change the expense it is necessary to do the same operation, only with the existing expense. 

To change the category name: select the category you want to change, click "Change the name of the selected category", enter a new name and click "OK". 

By pressing the "Default" button, you can return the name of the changed category.
//expenses_more from to In percents > As a list > Categories > Categories >>> Total: Income: Expense: Select categories to display: Select all / 
reset all
The specified start date of the search should not exceed the end date of the search. 
The end date of the search will be automatically corrected.
All income and expenses On this screen you can view all your income and expenses, total balance, as well as the amount of income and expenses separately. 

To open income or expense to view, change or delete, click on it. 

To select a time period, click on the date you want to change. 

To select the categories displayed, click "Categories >" and check all categories that you want to track. 

To see how much you spent on each category and how much is a percentage of the total expenses, click "In percents >". 

To go back to displaying all income and expenses,
click "As a list >"
//debts_new Debt Debt Amount: Whom owe: Who owe: Debt start date: Debt return date: owe i owe me Debt added Debt updated Debt removed Enter whom owe! Enter who owe! Do you really want to delete this debt? 
(this action is irreversible)
The selected debt start date must not exceed the debt return date. 
The debt return date will be automatically corrected.
Debt operations On this screen you can add a new debt, change or delete an existing one. 

To add a debt, enter the amount, enter who or whom owe, select the debt start date and debt return date, select whether you owe or owe you, choose how the calculation was made: by card or in cash, if necessary, add a comment. 

To change the debt it is necessary to do the same operation, only with the existing debt.
//debts_more I owe money Owe me money All debts On this screen you can see all your debts, as well as the amount you owe and owe you. 

To open a debt to view, change or delete, click on it.
